station.name: Classic FM
station.desc: UK-based station playing classical music from the past and present.
station.longDesc: Classic FM is a British independent national radio station that broadcasts classical music. It aims to make classical music accessible to a wider audience by playing popular classical pieces and providing context and information about the music and composers.

station.name: Radio Paradise
station.desc: A listener-supported internet radio station blending eclectic music genres.
station.longDesc: Radio Paradise is an internet radio station that offers a curated mix of modern and classic rock, world music, electronica, and more. It's known for its high-quality audio streams and thoughtful song selections, providing a unique listening experience.

station.name: 1.FM - Absolute Country Hits
station.desc: Streaming the best of country music from classic to contemporary hits.
station.longDesc: 1.FM's Absolute Country Hits station plays a mix of country music, featuring both classic tracks and the latest hits. It's part of the 1.FM network, which offers a variety of genre-specific internet radio stations.

station.name: Hot 108 JAMZ
station.desc: Top 40 and hip-hop hits streaming 24/7.
station.longDesc: Hot 108 JAMZ is an internet radio station that plays the latest in hip-hop and R&B music. It's part of the Powerhitz network and is known for its continuous stream of popular urban music hits.

station.name: WLTW 106.7 Lite FM (New York, USA)
station.desc: New York's Best Variety Radio Station, playing hits from the '80s to today.
station.longDesc: WLTW 106.7 Lite FM is a top-rated station in New York City, offering a mix of adult contemporary music, including pop, rock, and R&B hits. It's known for its family-friendly programming and seasonal music specials.

station.name: KEAN 105.1 FM (Abilene, Texas, USA)
station.desc: Texas' Best Country Music Radio Station.
station.longDesc: KEAN 105.1 FM is a country music station based in Abilene, Texas. It features a mix of contemporary and classic country hits, catering to fans of the genre with engaging hosts and community-focused content.

station.name: My House Radio
station.desc: Commercial-Free Dance Music, focusing on house, deep house, and soulful classics.
station.longDesc: My House Radio is dedicated to promoting artists and DJs who produce dance music in genres like house, deep house, soulful, and classics. With over 40 DJs from around the world, it offers 24/7 streaming without commercial interruptions.

station.name: BBC Radio 1 Dance
station.desc: BBC's dedicated dance music stream, featuring the best in electronic music.
station.longDesc: BBC Radio 1 Dance is a 24/7 stream from the BBC, focusing on dance music genres. It features exclusive mixes, live sets, and shows from top DJs, providing a platform for both established and emerging electronic music artists.

station.name: NRJ Hits
station.desc: France's top hit music station, broadcasting internationally.
station.longDesc: NRJ (Nouvelle Radio Jeune) is a French multimedia group known for its popular hit music radio station. NRJ Hits plays a mix of contemporary pop, dance, and R&B music, and is accessible in various countries through online streaming.

station.name: Kiss FM Australia
station.desc: Australia's leading dance music station.
station.longDesc: Kiss FM Australia is renowned for its dance music programming, featuring a mix of house, techno, and electronic beats. It's a favorite among club-goers and electronic music enthusiasts down under.

station.name: Energy FM
station.desc: The best mix of today's hits and throwbacks.
station.longDesc: Energy FM offers a vibrant mix of current chart-toppers and classic hits, catering to a broad audience that enjoys both new releases and nostalgic tracks.

station.name: The Beat
station.desc: Non-stop hip-hop and R&B hits.
station.longDesc: The Beat is your destination for the latest in hip-hop and R&B, playing a continuous stream of the hottest tracks from both established and emerging artists in the genre.

station.name: Absolute Country Hits
station.desc: The Music Starts Here
station.longDesc: All your favorite country hits and artists, from Johnny Cash to Taylor Swift, on 1.FM's Absolute Country, playing non-stop crooners and banjos, dance-tunes and fiddles, ballads and harmonicas. Absolute Country focuses on 5th, 6th and 7th generation Country (from the 90s on) but often delves into classic, older tunes as well.

station.name: Classic Rock
station.desc: Classic Rock Hits
station.longDesc: Classic rock is a radio format which developed from the album-oriented rock (AOR) format in the early 1980s. In the United States, the classic rock format features music ranging generally from the late 1960s to the late 1980s, primarily focusing on commercially successful hard rock popularized in the 1970s. The radio format became increasingly popular with the baby boomer demographic by the end of the 1990s.

station.longDesc: Cheesy FM is home to all things cheesy. Pop, Dance, Boy-Bands, One-Hit Wonders, Camp Classics, Party Anthems, the 70s, 80s, 90s & the big songs of today! Pure cheese, and proud of it.

station.name: Dance FM
station.longDesc: Hello and Welcome to ''Circuito Dance''. Circuito Dance is a passion project establishes in November 2018. It is about passion for radio, passion for electronic music, passion for fun remixes music, and passion for uplifting music that makes you feel good. This internet based radio station, ''Circuito Dance'', broadcasts hits musics and remixes from yesterday and today and features DJ sets from the hottest DJs from around the world as well as the best group of radios such as: Dance FM ''Playing The Music You Love'', Hot Dance Radio ''Hits With The Beat!'' & HITZ FM ''All The Hitz, All The Time''. And, now, 90s HITS ''We Love Them''. Additionally, the best soft music in English and Spanish. Romantic FM ''Straight To Your Heart'', Romántica ''No Solo Se Escucha, También Se Siente'', Jazz FM ''Feel the Music'', Italo Dance ''The Sound of Disco''. And, now, Classics FM ''Music Made Classics''. Thank you for listening us!

station.name: Alfa 91.3
station.desc: Only The Hits You Love
station.longDesc: The top-rated English Top 40 hits station in Mexico.

station.name: Capital FM (UK)
station.desc: The UK's No.1 Hit Music Station, playing the biggest hits from the world's hottest artists.
station.longDesc: Capital FM is a network of twelve independent contemporary hit radio stations in the United Kingdom, broadcasting a mix of local and networked programming. It targets a core audience in the 15–34 age group and is widely available on various platforms, including Global Player, Freeview, Sky, Freesat, Virgin Media, and Digital One DAB.

station.name: WIHT HOT 99.5 (Washington, D.C.)
station.desc: Washington D.C.'s #1 Hit Music Station, featuring the latest Top 40 hits.
station.longDesc: WIHT (99.5 FM), branded as HOT 99.5, is a contemporary hit radio station serving the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area. Owned by iHeartMedia, it offers a mix of current popular music, entertainment, and on-air personalities.

station.name: Hits Radio UK
station.desc: The UK's biggest hits and the best throwbacks, all in one place.
station.longDesc: Hits Radio UK is a national digital radio station in the United Kingdom, playing a mix of contemporary hits and classic tracks. It caters to a broad audience with a focus on popular music and entertainment.

station.name: iHeartRadio Top 40
station.desc: America's Top 40 hits, streaming live from iHeartRadio.
station.longDesc: iHeartRadio's Top 40 station features the most popular songs in the United States, spanning pop, hip-hop, and R&B genres. It offers listeners a curated selection of current chart-toppers.

station.name: BBC World Service
station.desc: The world's largest international broadcaster, offering news, analysis, and cultural programming in English and other languages.
station.longDesc: The BBC World Service is a British public service broadcaster owned and operated by the BBC. It broadcasts radio news, speech, and discussions in more than 40 languages to many parts of the world on analogue and digital shortwave platforms, internet streaming, podcasting, satellite, DAB, FM, LW, and MW relays. In 2024, the World Service reached an average of 450 million people a week via TV, radio, and online.

station.name: NPR (National Public Radio)
station.desc: A nonprofit media organization in the U.S. that produces and distributes news and cultural programming.
station.longDesc: NPR is an American privately and publicly funded nonprofit media organization based in Washington, D.C. It serves as a national syndicator to a network of over 1,000 public radio stations in the United States. NPR produces and distributes news and cultural programming, including shows like 'Morning Edition' and 'All Things Considered'.

station.name: WNYC-FM
station.desc: New York City's flagship public radio station, offering news, talk, and cultural programming.
station.longDesc: WNYC-FM is a public radio station licensed to New York City. It is owned by New York Public Radio, a nonprofit organization. WNYC-FM broadcasts a mix of news, talk, and cultural programming, including shows like 'The Brian Lehrer Show' and 'Radiolab'.

station.name: Jazz24
station.desc: A 24/7 jazz station featuring the greatest jazz artists of all time.
station.longDesc: Jazz24 is a non-commercial, listener-supported jazz station based in Tacoma, Washington. It offers a continuous stream of jazz music, featuring artists like Miles Davis, Billie Holiday, and John Coltrane. Jazz24 is available online and through various streaming platforms.

station.name: KEXP 90.3 FM
station.desc: Seattle-based radio station known for its eclectic mix of alternative and indie music.
station.longDesc: KEXP is a public radio station based in Seattle, Washington, renowned for its diverse and eclectic music programming. It features live in-studio performances, interviews, and a wide range of music genres, including alternative, indie, hip-hop, and electronic.

station.name: SomaFM: Indie Pop Rocks!
station.desc: Independent pop music from emerging artists.
station.longDesc: SomaFM's Indie Pop Rocks! channel features the best in indie pop music, showcasing emerging artists and bands. It's a commercial-free, listener-supported station that offers a curated selection of indie tracks.

station.name: KIIS FM Los Angeles
station.desc: Los Angeles' #1 Hit Music Station, playing the hottest tracks.
station.longDesc: KIIS-FM is a commercial radio station licensed to Los Angeles, California. It airs a Top 40/CHR format and is owned by iHeartMedia. KIIS-FM is known for its popular morning show and for hosting the annual Jingle Ball concert.

station.name: NRJ Hits
station.desc: France's top hit music station, broadcasting internationally.
station.longDesc: NRJ (Nouvelle Radio Jeune) is a French multimedia group known for its popular hit music radio station. NRJ Hits plays a mix of contemporary pop, dance, and R&B music, and is accessible in various countries through online streaming.

station.name: Nova FM Australia
station.desc: Australia's premier hit music station, featuring the latest chart-toppers.
station.longDesc: Nova FM is a network of radio stations in Australia, broadcasting a contemporary hit radio format. Nova 96.9 in Sydney is one of its flagship stations, known for playing current hits and engaging morning shows.

station.name: Kiss FM UK
station.desc: UK's leading station for hip-hop, R&B, and dance hits.
station.longDesc: Kiss FM UK is a national digital radio station, playing a mix of contemporary hits, including hip-hop, R&B, and dance music. It's part of the Bauer Radio network and is known for its energetic DJs and popular music programs.
